page.title: 08LUDFORD _ SUMMARY Continued
page.content: Much Ludford information in Domesday Proj: Grid 05200387 next to this one needing only brief reference here:_ Page of Grid 05200387 covers: 11_Church,School,Pub & Fish/Chip Shop. 12 & 13 School. 14_Church of SS Mary & Peter. 15_Transport_2 buses per wk. Railway at Mkt.Rasen: 100 Holiday Coaches at weekends: Motorway network 24 miles at Barnetby: 1 Taxi in Vill: 16_Government _ Parliamentary _ Local Govt. (One difference here in that Ludford is in East Lindsey D.C. based Louth while Sixhills & North Willingham in West Lindsey based at Gainsboro') Parish Council & Anglian Water Board. 17_Services Public & Private 18_Energy & Domestic Heating 19_Recreation,Footpaths,Women's Inst. 20_Entertainment in home and outside.
